_header: He ate bread but a quantity
_description: Metrical exemplum concerning Charlemagne and Theobaldus of Champagne, similar to versions found in ‘Jacob’s Well’ and the ‘Alphabet of Tale’

HarEng1032.First Lines:
…He ete brede bot a quantiteTua hennes at anes here ett wald
                    heOr elles a Pakok or a craneOr a gose dyght till hym
                    ane…
HarEng1032.Note:
Parts of two bifolia, with portions of each page torn away, with loss of
                    text.

Heffernan,  Thomas J.
